name: Tough Story: Big Hell
description: They took your life. Now you're back to send everybody to burn in hell!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB), Intel HD Graphics 4400 (Shared), Radeon X1600 XT (256 MB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 2.2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB), Intel HD Graphics 4400 (Shared), Radeon X1600 XT (256 MB) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
